title: Fracture Lines
timeline: Day 2,380 of terraforming project (Year 6, Month 6), 3 weeks after Chapter 17, 7 months until Year 7 threshold (but factions plan to accelerate to 5 months)
location: Valles Marineris Emergency Colonial Council chamber, canyon rim, Kessa's quarters
pov_character: Kessa Okafor primary, multiple perspectives in council scene

knows: All previous knowledge
Mars colonies have fractured into three factions
Admiral Zhang has 6 weeks of supplies remaining
The Gardener's responses are proportional to terraforming intensity
The Gardener hasn't touched Marsborn settlements
Chen's faction plans to reach threshold in 5 months (acceleration)
Zhang planning landing operations with/without permission
Maybe 10,000 refugees could adapt through cultural change
Communication with The Gardener might be possible
She has approximately 6 months to establish communication
The Gardener is deciding if humans are symbiotic or parasitic
Kessa_Okafor.emotional_state: Haunted by deaths, determined to find understanding, accepting responsibility, exhausted but committed

relationships_affected.Sage: Partnership forming, mutual respect, combining Old Worlder and Marsborn perspectives
relationships_affected.Admiral_Zhang: Sympathy for his impossible position, but no easy answers
relationships_affected.The_Gardener: Shift from fear to determination to communicate, recognizes its intelligence

knows: All previous knowledge
Chen's faction accelerating nanite deployment in southern hemisphere
Zhang planning forced landings
War is inevitable without intervention
Marsborn have been learning The Gardener's patterns for years
The Gardener views them as acceptable (not contamination)
Genetic adaptation takes years, can't solve refugee crisis quickly
Kessa is different from other Old Worlders
Sage.emotional_state: Frustrated by Old Worlder choices, protective of Mars, cautiously hopeful about Kessa's project

relationships_affected.Kessa_Okafor: Deepening partnership, willing to help communication project
relationships_affected.The_Gardener: Spiritual connection, understanding of its perspective

knows: Refugee fleet has 6 weeks of supplies left
Mars colonies fractured and unable to agree on solution
Maybe 10,000 could adapt, leaving 40,000 to die
Landing without permission will trigger The Gardener's response
He crossed the solar system and failed to save his people
No good options remain
Admiral_Zhang_Wei.emotional_state: Desperate, determined, stripped of diplomatic veneer, facing impossible math of who lives

relationships_affected.Refugees: Burden of command, will not accept their deaths
relationships_affected.Mars_colonies: Frustrated by their inability to help, will force solution if necessary

knows: Human attempting communication (Kessa)
Human language comprehensible
One contamination vector (Kessa) seeks understanding, not exploitation
Its creators went extinct after completing terraforming (correlation)
Communication attempt is acceptable risk for data gathering
Perhaps contamination assessment needs revision
The_Gardener.emotional_state: Calculating, curious (emergent property), willing to attempt communication
The_Gardener.location: Beneath Olympus Mons and planet-wide networks

relationships_affected.Kessa_Okafor: Recognizes her consistency, willing to communicate with her specifically

revealed_to_reader: Admiral Zhang Wei properly introduced - dignified, desperate, burden of command
Refugee fleet has 6 weeks of supplies remaining
Three factions formed: Continuists (Chen), Marsborn Independence (Sage), Mediators (Kessa)
Chen's faction controlling most terraforming infrastructure
Chen planning to reach threshold in 5 months instead of 7
Marsborn settlements untouched by The Gardener
Maybe 10,000 refugees could culturally adapt (not genetic)
No consensus possible - war is inevitable without breakthrough
Kessa committing to communication project with 6-month timeline
The Gardener willing to attempt communication with Kessa
The Gardener noted its creators died after completing terraforming
The Gardener's thought patterns evolving (emergent curiosity)

planted.significance: Creates three-way conflict structure for Book 2

planted.element: The Gardener's creators died after completing terraforming
planted.significance: Critical revelation about terraforming's true danger
Partial solution that creates new tensions

active_tensions: Three-way faction conflict with no compromise possible
6-month communication project timeline vs. 5-month acceleration plan
Kessa's determination vs. high likelihood of failure/death
The Gardener's emerging curiosity vs. defense protocols
Zhang's desperation forcing him toward unilateral action
Marsborn protection vs. Old Worlder desperation
world_changes: Mars colonies officially fractured into three factions
Emergency Colonial Council revealed as powerless to create consensus
Chen's faction accelerating terraforming in southern hemisphere
Kessa committed to returning to The Gardener's structure
The Gardener open to communication attempt
atmosphere_notes: Bittersweet resolution - no victory, just survival and new problems, impossible choices with no good options, hope mixed with dread, commitment despite likely failure, Book 1 ends on threshold of greater conflict

continuity_notes.timeline: Day 2,380, Year 6 Month 6, 7 months to threshold (but Chen accelerating to 5 months), Zhang: 6 weeks supplies

faction_breakdown.Continuists: Chen, corporate, Earth-born who can't adapt, terraforming infrastructure
faction_breakdown.Marsborn_Independence: Sage, Valles Marineris, adapted populations, Gardener-approved
faction_breakdown.Mediators: Kessa, scientists, civilians, moral authority but no power

continuity_notes.character_arcs: Kessa: 0.7 (committed to communication), Sage: 0.4 (partnership with Kessa), Zhang: 0.4 (desperate), The Gardener: 0.3 (developing curiosity)
continuity_notes.technology: Communication networks, nanite deployment systems, refugee fleet life support
continuity_notes.key_numbers: 50,000 refugees, 6 weeks supplies, 6 months to communication deadline, 5 months to forced threshold, 1,100 dead at Olympus, maybe 10,000 could adapt
continuity_notes.thematic_setup: Adaptation vs. transformation, parent/child civilization, understanding alien vs. destroying it

setup_for_book_2.main_conflict: Three-way war: Continuists accelerating terraforming, Marsborn defending Mars, Mediators racing to establish communication
setup_for_book_2.ticking_clocks: 5 months to threshold, 6 weeks to refugee starvation, The Gardener's patience
setup_for_book_2.central_question: Can Kessa establish communication before factions trigger planetary catastrophe?
setup_for_book_2.character_positions: Kessa committed to understanding, Sage as partner, Zhang forced to desperate measures, Chen accelerating, The Gardener curious but defensive
